#define rot(a)  mat2(cos(a+vec4(0,11,33,0)))                       // rotation
#define door    max( a.x-1.,max(a.y-2.,a.z-.05))

void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U) 
{
    float t=9.,h=0.,l, T=2.*iTime,d,f,k;                           // d,f,k: hit object id 
    vec3  R = iResolution,
          D = normalize(vec3((U+U-R.xy)/R.y, -1.5)),               // ray direction
          p = vec3(0,1,0), q, a,qd,                                // marching point along ray 
          M = iMouse.z > 0. ? iMouse.xyz/R -.5: vec3(2,.1,0)/1e2*cos(1.3*T+vec3(0,11,0))+vec3(0,.05,0); 

    for ( O=vec4(1); O.x > 0. && t > .01; O-=.005 )                // --- draw the sharp cubes
        q = p,
        q.yz *= rot(.5-6.3*M.y), 
        q.xz *= rot(-6.3*M.x),
        q.z -= T, l = floor(q.z/3.+.8)*3.-1.+T,  // ( thanks to spalmer for the debug ! )
        q.z = mod(q.z+1.8,3.) - 1.8,
        a = q, a.x++, a.xz *= rot( -2.*smoothstep(-1.,0.,l/3.+.5) ), a.x--, // --- doors
        qd= a, a = abs(a), t = d = door,
        t = min(t, k = length(qd - vec3(.8,.1,.1))-.1),            // door knob
        q.z = abs(q.z)-.02,                                        // --- walls
        a = abs(q), 
        t = min(t, max( min( q.z, f= q.y+2.),                      // wall+floor
                       -door ) ),                                  // door hole
        p += .25*t*D;                                              // step forward = dist to obj
        
                                                                   // --- materials
    O *= t==d ? texture(iChannel2,qd.yx) // vec4(.6,.3,.1,1);      // doors
       : t==k ? vec4(.7,.6,0,1) + 1e2*pow(.58*(qd.x+qd.y+qd.z),15.)// knob
       : t==f ? texture(iChannel0,q.xz ) // * vec4(.2,.2,.5,1);    // floor
       :        texture(iChannel1,q.xy )*.2+.8;                    // walls
}
